document.full_text: the republican leader of the state house has apologized to a roman catholic bishop, john b. mccormack, for calling him a 'pedophile pimp.'
document.title: new england: new hampshire: politician apologizes to bishop
lines_and_colors: the republican leader of the state house has apologized to a roman catholic bishop, john b. mccormack, for calling him a 'pedophile pimp.'
